mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 - b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 * b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 - b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 * b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(1, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(-1, top_right - bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right + bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area

import numpy as np

def calculate_overlap_area(a1, b1, a2, b2):
    top_right = np.minimum(a1 + b1, a2 + b2)
    bottom_left = np.maximum(a1, a2)
    overlap_size = np.maximum(0, top_right * bottom_left)
    overlap_area = np.prod(overlap_size)
    return overlap_area
